TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content: It's not a conspiracy if the steel plate in my skull really is picking up transmissions directly from Squad.

"This app appears to be popular. Are you waiting for an update? Please come to #steamdb-announce on FreeNode and monitor there."

Looks like we're putting just a 'lil strain on steamdb
Lol, we broke steamdb, they had to put up a notice.

Bummer... returning to my seat. I guess I'll see you guys again tomorrow...

Info from the Steam DB:

HA!
Darn, even the last page button can't keep up...
The Hype is real xD
I will have to set up some nice looking charity website to fool you all... ppl never think how much of those donations go actually to the children
SteamDB is telling us to knock it off, you guys.
Hi. I've been away for a couple of months. Anything new coming up?

I will have to set up some nice looking charity website to fool you all... ppl never think how much of those donations go actually to the children

An attitude like that and no charity would ever get anything.

My wife is a Psychologist and has worked in the past and still is doing a lot of charity ran volunteering.

Places like this rely on help from other people.

Hi. I've been away for a couple of months. Anything new coming up?

Prepare yourself.... I've no idea if you're kidding or what.
I have never seen an IRC chat explode quite like #steamdb-announce just has. The channel topic has even been changed for our hypetrain pleasure.

Hi. I've been away for a couple of months. Anything new coming up?

Yeah, somebody was talking about pizza.

Hi. I've been away for a couple of months. Anything new coming up?

Yes, Squad has captured an alien spaceship and is integrating the technology they've reverse-engineered from it into 0.24. Hence the delay.

SteamDB is telling us to knock it off, you guys.

Lol. It takes something serious for a service like SteamDB to complain about having to many pageviews. If only there was a way for them to monetize that?
I'm picturing Steam leaning on Squad to hurry up because we keep leg-humpping steamdb.
AAGH! The 502 Bad Gateway Monster almost ate this thread for me.
So Germans can currently buy the game for free?

I have never seen an IRC chat explode quite like #steamdb-announce just has. The channel topic has even been changed for our hypetrain pleasure.

I love all the HYPETRAIN nicks that showed up
[steam Database Monitoring [ http://steamdb.info ] | Chat in main channel: #steamdb | Report issues: http://git.io/steamdb | Wait until SteamDB announces a Kerbal Space Program changelist]
This is madness!
Holy Hell, the 502's are fireing up again.

I left my PC on for a few hours, came back, reloaded, looked at the page count. This is seriously what I said:

"Oh sweet mother of Jeb"
